articles.author: RAJESH KUMAR SINGH, SHEIKH SAALIQ
articles.title: Police say at least 30 people have died in a stampede at the massive Maha Kumbh festival in India - The Associated Press
articles.description: Police say at least 30 people were killed and many more injured in a stampede at the world’s largest religious gathering as millions of pilgrims rushed to dip in sacred waters during the Maha Kumbh festival in northern India. Police said 60 others were injure…
articles.content: PRAYAGRAJ, India (AP) At least 30 people were killed and many more injured in a stampede at the worlds largest religious gathering early Wednesday, police said, as millions of pilgrims rushed to dip … [+6312 chars]
